info.name: Facebook Trending Ticker Hider
info.description: Annoyed by Facebook's new "Trending Topics" ticker that has no relevance to your life whatsoever? Simply hide it and never see it again! Also hides "Sponsored" links on the sidebar! Available on Github: http://github.com/thinkaliker/scripts
info.additionalInfo:
v1.2 - Now hides recommended games because why not
v1.1 - Now hides sponsored links because why not
v1.0 - Initial Release
